item.description:
We're still in financial mode for this meeting. Our speaker will be discussing women's financial issues.

Light snacks will be served. Please bring your business cards for a raffle!

Please note that we'll be in the same building as before (in Newton -- right off the Pike) but in a nicer room, upstairs. So please enter the FRONT door; not the back, side door. There will be signs.

Looking forward to seeing everyone!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture on the site.
item.why: You'll have the opportunity to meet career women like you who want to support each other. Every month, we'll have a different speaker who will present a topic of interest. Plus, there will be lots of time for socializing!
item.name: Women in Business Network March Meeting
